greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Let m = A013929(n); then a(n) = smallest k such that m divides k^2.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Henry Ibstedt, Surfing on the Ocean of Numbers, Erhus Univ. Press, Vail, 1997.
mathematica: f[p_, e_] := p^Ceiling[e/2]; s[1] = 1; s[n_] := Times @@ f @@@ FactorInteger[n]; s /@ Select[Range[200], !SquareFreeQ[#] &] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Feb 10 2021 *)
results.author: R. Muller
ext: Description corrected by Diego Torres (torresvillarroel(AT)hotmail.com), Jun 23 2002
